Package com.camerontec.util.collection.persisted.journaling

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IIndexUpdateListener
    TODO
    IJournalingStoreAccessor
    Defines journaling persistent stores.
    IJournalingStoreAccessor.IWriteRequestHandler
    Instances of this interface are used as recipients of write requests iterations.
    IVersionComparator
    Interface for classes capable of comparing versions.
    JournalingPersistentStoreIndexer
    An instance of this interface serves as an external indexer to an ExternallyIndexedJournalingPersistentStore.
    JournalingPersistentStoreProgressReporter
    ProgressReporter sub-interface that allows JournalingPersistentStoreBase to provide necessary reporting context.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractJournalingPersistentStoreIndexer<T>
    Base JournalingPersistentStoreIndexer implementation which uses an IBytesSegmentExternalizer to deserialize write request values when scanning the journal.
    AsynchronousPersistentByteArrayStore
    The class provides a wrapper around the given IPersistentByteArrayStore to perform asynchronous writes.
    DefaultJournalingPersistentStoreProgressReporter
    ProgressReporter implementation intended for use by JournalingPersistentStoreBase.
    ExternallyIndexedJournalingPersistentStore
    Journaling persistent store implementation combining a journal and an external indexer.
    HighCapacityIndexedJournalingPersistentStore
    High-capacity indexed journal implementation providing an historical list behaviour: it is only possible to append to the end of the list, remove from the end of the list, or clear the list.
    HighCapacityIndexedJournalingPersistentStoreProperties
    Contains property definitions used by HighCapacityIndexedJournalingPersistentStore instances.
    HighCapacityIndexerFactory
    Depending on configuration this factory will create HighCapacityIndexedJournalingPersistentStoreSharedThreadIndexer or HighCapacityIndexedJournalingPersistentStoreOwnThreadIndexer.
    IndexedJournalingPersistentStore
    Indexed journal implementation providing a list-like behaviour.
    InMemoryIndexingJournalingPersistentStore
    Base class for journal implementations that rely on in-memory indexing and therefore require to fully scan the journal at load time.
    InMemoryIndexingJournalingPersistentStoreProperties
    Contains property definitions used by InMemoryIndexingJournalingPersistentStore instances.
    JournalingPersistentStoreBase
    Base abstract superclass of store implementations which provided the foundations of persistent journaling stores.
    JournalingPersistentStoreProperties
    Contains property definitions used by JournalingPersistentStoreBase instances.
    JournalingPersistentStoreVersionHistory
    An instance of this class is used by JournalingPersistentStoreBase implementations to maintain an in-memory version history offset series, which is used to access version history up to a certain number of versions.
    MappedJournalingPersistentStore
    Mapped implementation of a persistent journaling store providing a map-like behaviour.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JournalingPersistentStoreBase.JournalingTask
    Journaling maintenance tasks
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JournalScanningException
    Instances of this unchecked exception class are thrown by JournalingPersistentStoreBase implementations to report that an exception happened when scanning the journal.
    MissingJournalFileException
    Instances of this unchecked exception type are thrown by persistent journal store implementations to report that a journal file is missing.
    VersionComparisonException
    Thrown to indicate an error comparing versions using an IVersionComparator.
